about_the_game:
Banyu Lintar Angin is a series of experimental illustrations about three siblings, living together independently in a rural Indonesian environment. Follow the down-to-earth daily life of these siblings, accompanied by music that perfectly captures their activities.

DLC Content

Support us and get the Deluxe Edition of the product that contains:
  • Mini soundtrack album
  • Step by step of Banyu Lintar Angin - Little Storm production in PDF format
  • HD version of the illustrations in PDF and PNG format

Accessing The DLC

After purchasing and downloading the Banyu Lintar Angin - Little Storm - Deluxe Edition, you can access the content in the game's directory folder. Here are the steps to access the files:
  • Open up Steam and go to your Library tab
  • Right click on Banyu Lintar Angin - Little Storm and select Properties
  • In the Properties window, select Local Files tab and find the "Browse Local Files" button.
  • This will take you to the Banyu Lintar Angin - Little Storm's game directory, which has the Deluxe content included in it.
As for the soundtrack, you can also enjoy it via your Steam Music Library
